post:
We are proud to present our shared new shared hosting service under name DataMotel.

We focus on keeping things simple and cheap. In this case we are offering bundle based on Interworx panel with Softaculous and pure raid 10 SSD storage on modern E3 V3 cpus.

Servers are located in Buffalo and they are on CC network.

**Plan #1**  
Storage: 1 GB RAID10 SSD  
Transfer: 250GB Premium Bandwidth  
Domains: Unlimited  
Databases: Unlimited  
Emails: Unlimited  
FTP Accounts: Unlimited  
**Based on Interworx panel**  
Price: 4 USD per year  
[**ORDER HERE**](https://drserver.net/shared)

**Plan #2**  
Storage: 10GB RAID10 SSD  
Transfer: Unlimited 1Gbps Bandwidth  
Domains: Unlimited  
Databases: Unlimited  
Emails: Unlimited  
FTP Accounts: Unlimited  
**Based on Interworx panel**  
Price: 4 USD per month  
[**ORDER HERE**](https://drserver.net/shared)

If you need any other information feel free to open a ticket on https://drserver.net

Thank you and have a nice day.
